question:
Consider the following diseases:
  1. Dengue
  2. Leprosy
  3. Ebola virus disease (EVD)
Which of the above has/have been categorised as Neglected Tropical Disease(s) by WHO (World Health Organization)?
explanation: Neglected tropical diseases (NTDs) are a diverse group of communicable diseases that prevail in tropical and subtropical conditions. All of the above given diseases have been categorised as Neglected Tropical Diseases by WHO.
